players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
Charlie was found dead.
You investigated Bob and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
Bob: "That's terrible about Charlie. I didn't hear anything suspicious last night — I was asleep. We should focus on who had motives to target Charlie. Any information from investigations?"
You: "Bob is the mafioso. Vote to arrest Bob now."
Diana: "Accusing someone this quickly feels risky — Alice, why are you so sure Bob is mafia?"
Diana: "Voting to arrest someone needs more than an accusation — Alice, what makes you sure Bob is mafia? Bob, anything you can tell us about last night?"
Bob: "I didn't do it — Alice's claim is baseless. Why would I immediately kill Charlie and then admit nothing? Alice, what proof do you have?"
You: "Bob is the mafioso. I investigated him last night and my result is clear — vote Bob."
